name: Important Windows Service Terminated With Error
description: Detects important or interesting Windows services that got terminated for whatever reason
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection_eid: {"Provider_Name": "Service Control Manager", "EventID": 7023}
selection_name: [{"param1|contains": [" Antivirus", " Firewall", "Application Guard", "BitLocker Drive Encryption Service", "Encrypting File System", "Microsoft Defender", "Threat Protection", "Windows Event Log"]}, {"Binary|contains": ["770069006e0064006500660065006e006400", "4500760065006e0074004c006f006700", "6d0070007300730076006300", "530065006e0073006500", "450046005300", "420044004500530056004300"]}]

falsepositives: Rare false positives could occur since service termination could happen due to multiple reasons
